column4: hi all, can I reuse Home directory from my old installation when I install a fresh installation?
I want use the same old home folder in the new installation
if /home is in different partition then yes you can
and tell be both your os old and the new you want to install?
I just want to install 10.04, I am now using 9.10
abhi_nav:In the home folder there will be many hidden configuration files
abhi_nav:So when I install new there is a chance of conflicting ...
one e.g. firefox ./mozilla files also note that i never tried this. and note the use work 'may' :D
abhi_nav:ok What if I remove all the folders and file which starts with (DOT)
abhi_nav:can I avoid conflicts by this way ?
try that. it is obviousl that apls will not conflict after that. but as I said I never tried it.
